sentences.sContent: The best gauge of quake risk is the geologic record.
sentences.sContent_eng: The best gauge of quake risk is the geologic record.
sentences.sCn: 我们最好的测量地震风险的办法是地质记录。

sentences.sContent: If we have indeed entered a new epoch, then when exactly did it begin? When did human impacts rise to the level of geologic significance?
sentences.sContent_eng: If we have indeed entered a new epoch, then when exactly did it begin? When did human impacts rise to the level of geologic significance?
sentences.sCn: 如果我们确实迈进了新的世，那么是什么时候开始的，什么时候人类的影响会达到地质学重要意义的程度？

sentences.sContent: Various reactors in this country are situated near geologic faults, in coastal areas reachable by tsunamis or in areas potentially vulnerable to flooding.
sentences.sContent_eng: Various reactors in this country are situated near geologic faults, in coastal areas reachable by tsunamis or in areas potentially vulnerable to flooding.
sentences.sCn: 美国有许多反应堆位于地质断层附近，海啸能够到达的沿海地区或是易受到洪水侵袭的区域。

phrases.pCn: 地质调查，地质勘探；地质测量；地质调查所
地质时期，地质时代；地质年代
